cab.content:
SECRET
G.T.1096 WAR CABINET.
Prom:- Brig-General Ballard To:- D.M.I.
Jassy.
15th June.
B.A.634.
According to reliable information 3 regiments from 2 different divisions refused to go to the front and have by orders of the Russian Government been disbanded.
Russian officers here have been discussing question and say that it points to extreme weakness and is likely to have prejudicial effect5 on the other hand Captain Barratt who is on visit to State (Sixth?) Army reports that there is improvement in morale there.
